content: Sujoy Datta - KIIT School of Computer Engineering Skip to content Go to KIIT Home pageKIIT HomeProf. Achyuta Samanta Founder – KIIT & KISS achyutasamanta.com Sujoy Datta Sujoy Datta Sujoy Datta Assistant ProfessorSujoy Datta has 6 years of experience in teaching, teaching B.Tech and M.Tech classes in Bhubaneswar , Odisha. He earned an M.Tech in Computer Science and Data Processing from IIT Kharagpur, India.
